statements: SELECT transaction_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_date, AVG(sale_amount) as average_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id, sale_date ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 AND sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT forecast_id, product_name, predicted_demand FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT order_id, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Lorem Ipsum' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE order_date <= '2022-02-28'
SELECT forecast_date, product_name, predicted_demand FROM sales_forecast WHERE predicted_demand >= 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, sale_amount, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM CustomerData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM TrendAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM CustomerData WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT category, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY category HAVING total_sales > 10000
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM CustomerData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT trend_description, trend_impact FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE forecast_demand > 500 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT description, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, forecast_quantity, forecast_date FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, revenue FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND revenue > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecast_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 5 AND price < 100
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE '%S' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT representative_name, region, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate >= 3.00 ORDER BY commission_rate DESC, region ASC
